title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Home Plate
directions: between Pierce St and Steiner St
content: Wonderful breakfast/brunch place on Lombard St. Its always busy on weekends and it can feel a tad cramped but the food is worth it — delicious homemade scones with homemade jam and preserves, omelettes, pancakes/waffles, and eggs benedict.  This is certainly one of the best breakfast places in the city!
